00025 void mexFunction( int nlhs, mxArray *plhs[],
00026                   int nrhs, const mxArray *prhs[] )
00027 {
00028     if (nlhs>1)
00029         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00030     
00031     // Determine argument format between constructor or (id,method,...)
00032     vector<MxArray> rhs(prhs,prhs+nrhs);
00033     int id = 0;
00034     string method;
00035     if (nrhs==0) {
00036         // Constructor is called. Create a new object from argument
00037         obj_[++last_id] = NormalBayesClassifier();
00038         plhs[0] = MxArray(last_id);
00039         return;
00040     }
00041     else if (rhs[0].isNumeric() && rhs[0].numel()==1 && nrhs>1) {
00042         id = rhs[0].toInt();
00043         method = rhs[1].toString();
00044     }
00045     else
00046         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Invalid arguments");
00047     
00048     // Big operation switch
00049     NormalBayesClassifier& obj = obj_[id];
00050     if (method == "delete") {
00051         if (nrhs!=2 || nlhs!=0)
00052             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Output not assigned");
00053         obj_.erase(id);
00054     }
00055     else if (method == "clear") {
00056         if (nrhs!=2 || nlhs!=0)
00057             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00058         obj.clear();
00059     }
00060     else if (method == "load") {
00061         if (nrhs!=3 || nlhs!=0)
00062             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00063         obj.load(rhs[2].toString().c_str());
00064     }
00065     else if (method == "save") {
00066         if (nrhs!=3 || nlhs!=0)
00067             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00068         obj.save(rhs[2].toString().c_str());
00069     }
00070     else if (method == "train") {
00071         if (nrhs<4 || nlhs>1)
00072             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00073         Mat trainData(rhs[2].toMat(CV_32F));
00074         Mat responses(rhs[3].toMat(CV_32F));
00075         Mat varIdx;
00076         Mat sampleIdx;
00077         bool update=false;
00078         for (int i=4; i<nrhs; i+=2) {
00079             string key(rhs[i].toString());
00080             if (key=="VarIdx")
00081                 varIdx = rhs[i+1].toMat(CV_32S);
00082             else if (key=="SampleIdx")
00083                 sampleIdx = rhs[i+1].toMat(CV_32S);
00084             else if (key=="Update")
00085                 update = rhs[i+1].toBool();
00086             else
00087                 mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized option");
00088         }
00089         bool b = obj.train(trainData,responses,varIdx,sampleIdx,update);
00090         plhs[0] = MxArray(b);
00091     }
00092     else if (method == "predict") {
00093         if (nrhs<3 || nlhs>1)
00094             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00095         Mat samples(rhs[2].toMat(CV_32F)),results;
00096         obj.predict(samples,&results);
00097         plhs[0] = MxArray(results);
00098     }
00099     else
00100         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized operation");
00101 }
